apiKeyNotFound: API Key is invalid or unauthorized!
appKeyNotFound: App Key is invalid or unauthorized!
accountIsLock: Your account has been locked for security purposes.
loginWithUsernameAndPassword: Logged in with username and password
unixTimestampIsTooOld: Invalid Signature. The timestamp is to old, it must be at most 1 min before the servers current date and time.
resendAccountConfirmationEmailSuccess: We just sent you an email with instructions for how to reset your password and log into your account.
deviceIdDoesNotMatchWithConnectedDeviceI: Incoming message's device id (%s) does not match with any of your connected device's ids. Make sure your device ids are correct in the sketch !!
okYourMessageHasBeenQueuedForProcessing: OK. Your message has been queued for processing.
accessKeyIsAlreadyInUse: Access key is already in use. Please delete the associated devices first.
messageTypeNotFoundOrSupported: Message type is not found or supported
yourAccountHasExceededMax: Your account has exceeded the maximum number of registered devices. You can buy more devices from the Subscription menu
yourOrderWasNotFoundInPaypal: Your order id: %s was not found in Paypal
emailVerificationFailedFor: Email verification failed for %s. Please try again or use another email address!
temperatureRisesAbovePNBody: At @date @time, current temperature @temperature° is above threshold @alerttemperature° in @roomname!
temperatureFallsBelowPNBody: At @date @time, current temperature @temperature° is below threshold @alerttemperature° in @roomname!
pm25RisesAbovePNBody: At @date @time, current PM 2.5 level @pm2_5 μg/m3 is above threshold @alerttpm2_5 μg/m3 in @roomname!
youHaveExceededYourFreeSchedulesQuota: You have exceeded your free schedules quota. You can purchase licenses to increase schedules quota.
thisDeviceLicenseHasBeenExpired: This device license has been expired.
restoringFollowingDevicesLastKnownStateF: Restoring the following devices [%s] state from cloud.
yourIpAddressHasBeenBlockedBecauseTooMan: Your IP address has been blocked because of too many connection attempts. We have sent you an email with detailed information.
yourConnectionRateLimitExceededEmailBody: Your IP: @ip has reached the connection rate limit due to an abnormal connection attempts (200 connections in last 30 mins). This is likely due to firmware problems or poor internet connection resulting in connection loops. You should use 'Activity Log' to determine more details.
weAreRateLimitingYourIp: The rate-limiting on your IP @ip for @duration. This will result in not responding to some requests
onceYouHaveResovledTheIssue: Once you have resolved the issue, please contact us at @manufacture_email to unblock your IP or wait for the above specified time period end
controlTheDeviceThatCanBeExpressedAsAPer: Control the device that can be expressed as a percentage
controlTheModeSettingsOfADevice: Control the mode settings of a device
controlTheSettingsOfDevicesThatAreRepres: Control the settings of devices that are represented by numbers within a minimum and maximum range
cannotDeleteThisDeviceTemplateBecauseItI: Cannot delete this device template because it is being used by %s
controlTheBrightnessOfTheDevice: Control the brightness of devices such as light bulbs
changeOrIncreaseTheChannelForAnEntertain: Change or increment the channel for an entertainment device
changeTheColorOfTheDevice: Change the color of the device
changeTheColorTemperatureOfTheDevicesTha: Change the color temperature of devices that support tunable white light
adjustTheEqualizerBandsAndSoundModesOfAD: Adjust the equalizer bands and sound modes of a device.
changeTheInputOfAnEntertainmentDevice: Change the input of an entertainment device. eg: HDMI
voiceEnabledScrolling: Voice-enable scrolling, directional pad (d-pad) selection of an onscreen elements
lockOrUnlockALockableDevice: Lock or unlock a lockable device
devicesThatCanSensePhysicalMovementInAnA: Devices that can sense physical movement in an area
devicesThatCanPlayStopAndNavigateAudioVi: Devices that can play, stop, and navigate playback for audio or video content
speaker: Speaker
controlTheVolumeOfTheDevice: Control the volume of the device
devicesThatCanSenseTheCurrentTemperature: Devices that can sense the current temperature
devicesThatCanSenseTheTemperatureAndAtte: Devices that can sense the temperature and attempts to keep the temperature at a specified point
controlToggleSettingsOfTheDevice: Control toggle settings of the device
